dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: Hey, I've never seen you before! How's it going?

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Hey! Not bad, just chillin'. What's up with you?

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: So, we're going to do some group activities and I was wondering what role you'd like to play?

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Nah, it doesn't matter to me. I'm good with whatever.

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: Okay, cool. Have you read the book we're supposed to discuss for the group activity?

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Nah, I didn't bother. It's not that important, right?

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: Um, actually, we're supposed to bring the book to class. Did you bring it?

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Nah, I didn't bother. I'd rather play than do group activities, to be honest.

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: But the teacher said we have to do it together. It's not fair if you don't participate.

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Even if I don't do it, there are plenty of other people who can do it for me. And honestly, I'd rather play than waste my time on a book.

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: I understand that you want to have fun, but it's important that we all work together and learn from each other.

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Yeah, yeah, I know. But come on, can't we just have some fun for once?

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: I get it, but we have to follow the rules. And besides, there are plenty of other fun things we can do besides group activities.

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Fine, whatever. Can we just play now?

dialogues.speaker: NPC2
dialogues.text: I guess so. But let's at least try to do the group activity first, okay?

dialogues.speaker: NPC1
dialogues.text: Ugh, fine. But I'm only doing it because I have to, not because I want to.
